select count(p.id) FROM sop_project p WHERE p.id not in(SELECT tr.project_id FROM sop_transfer_record tr WHERE tr.record_status is null) and p.create_uid=#{createdId} and p.project_status = 'projectStatus:0' and p.project_progress='projectProgress:1'
and project_name like concat(concat('%','${pName}'),'%')

select p.id, p.project_code projectCode, p.project_name projectName, d1.name projectTypeName, d1.dict_code projectTypeCode, p.created_time createdTimeUnix, p.finance_mode financeMode, d5.name financeModeDs, date_format(from_unixtime(p.created_time/1000),'%Y-%m-%d') createdTimeDs,
p.create_uid createUid, u.user_name createUname, d7.name faFlag, d7.dict_code faFlagCode, p.fa_name faName,
p.project_status projectStatus, d3.name projectStatusDs, p.project_departId projectDepartId, t.name projectDepartName,
p.industry_own industryOwn, d4.name industryOwnDs,
u2.id hhrId, u2.user_name hhrName, d6.dict_code projectProgressCode, d6.`name` projectProgress, d6.dict_value projectProgressId from sop_project p left join dict d1 on d1.dict_code=p.project_type left join dict d2 on d2.dict_code=p.finance_status left join dict d3 on d3.dict_code=p.project_status left join dict d4 on p.industry_own=d4.dict_code and d4.parent_code='industryOwn' left join dict d5 on p.finance_mode=d5.dict_code left join dict d6 on d6.dict_code=p.project_progress left join dict d7 on d7.dict_code=p.fa_flag left join v_user u on u.id=p.create_uid left join v_department t on p.project_departId=t.id left join v_user u2 on t.dep_manager=u2.id where p.id=#{projectId};

SELECT CASE WHEN t.choose IN('尚未获投','不明确') THEN t.choose else id.name end financeStatus, CASE WHEN t.choose IN('尚未获投','不明确') THEN t.choose else id.id end financeStatusId, group_concat(case when t.tid=#{titleId1} then t.result else null end) as projectContribution, group_concat(case when t.tid=#{titleId2} then t.result else null end) as projectShareRatio, group_concat(case when t.tid=#{titleId3} then t.result else null end) as projectValuations, group_concat(case when t.tid=#{titleId4} then t.result else null end) as finalContribution, group_concat(case when t.tid=#{titleId5} then t.result else null end) as finalShareRatio, group_concat(case when t.tid=#{titleId6} then t.result else null end) as serviceCharge, group_concat(case when t.tid=#{titleId7} then t.result else null end) as finalValuations FROM (SELECT title_id tid, content_describe1 result, content_choose choose FROM information_result WHERE project_id=#{projectId} AND title_id in(#{titleId1},#{titleId2},#{titleId3},#{titleId4},#{titleId5},#{titleId6},#{titleId7},#{titleId8})) t LEFT JOIN information_dictionary id ON t.choose=id.id

select case (isnull(p.project_describe_financing) && isnull(p.project_describe)) when 1 then 0 else 1 end projectDescribe, case isnull(p.company_location) when 1 then 0 else 1 end companyLocation, case isnull(p.user_portrait) when 1 then 0 else 1 end userPortrait, case isnull(p.project_business_model) when 1 then 0 else 1 end projectBusinessModel, case isnull(p.operational_data) when 1 then 0 else 1 end operationalData, case isnull(p.industry_analysis) when 1 then 0 else 1 end industryAnalysis, case isnull(p.prospect_analysis) when 1 then 0 else 1 end prospectAnalysis, case isnull(p.next_financing_source) when 1 then 0 else 1 end nextFinancingSource, case count(f.id)<=0 when 1 then 0 else 1 end businessPlanFile, case count(l.id)<=0 when 1 then 0 else 1 end projectPerson, case count(f2.id)<=0 when 1 then 0 else 1 end projectFile, case count(s.id)<=0 when 1 then 0 else 1 end projectShares, case count(d.id)<=0 when 1 then 0 else 1 end projectDelivery, case count(h.id)>0 || count(m.id)>0 when 1 then 1 else 0 end operationalAnalysis
from sop_project p left join sop_file f on f.project_id=p.id and f.file_worktype='fileWorktype:12' left join sop_project_person l on p.id=l.project_id left join sop_file f2 on p.id=f2.project_id and f2.file_worktype in ( 'fileWorktype:1','fileWorktype:2','fileWorktype:3','fileWorktype:4','fileWorktype:5', 'fileWorktype:6','fileWorktype:7','fileWorktype:8','fileWorktype:9', 'fileWorktype:17','fileWorktype:18','fileWorktype:19') and f2.file_key is not null left join sop_project_shares s on s.project_id=p.id left join sop_delivery d on p.id=d.project_id left join sop_project_health h on p.id=h.project_id left join sop_meeting_record m on m.project_id=p.id and m.meeting_type in ('postMeetingType:1' ,'postMeetingType:2','postMeetingType:3') where p.id=#{projectId} group by p.id;
select case count(1)>0 when 1 then 1 else 0 end projectYjz from sop_transfer_record where project_id = #{projectId} and record_status is null

SELECT count(1) isFlag FROM sop_project p WHERE ( p.id in(SELECT tr.project_id FROM sop_transfer_record tr WHERE tr.record_status is null) or p.project_status = 'projectStatus:2') and p.id=#{projectId};
SELECT count(1) isFlag FROM sop_project p WHERE p.project_progress='projectProgress:1' and p.id=#{projectId};

mapper.update: update joint_delivery set delivery_type=#{financeMode} WHERE project_id=#{id};
